00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_time.h"
00029 #include "kvi_qstring.h"
00030 
00031 //
00032 // This class is used as container for miscelaneous connection state variables
00033 // that do not have a class for their own.
00034 // If you need to add some "minor" variable to the connection state then
00035 // this is the right place for it.
00036 //
00037 
00038 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionStateData
00039 {
00040         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00041         friend class KviServerParser;
00042         friend class KviUserParser;
00043 public:
00044         KviIrcConnectionStateData();
00045         ~KviIrcConnectionStateData();
00046 protected:
00047         bool         m_bInsideCapLs;                  // true if there's a CAP LS request pending
00048         bool         m_bInsideAuthenticate;           // true if there's a AUTHENTICATE request pending
00049         bool         m_bSentStartTls;                 // the state of STARTTLS protocol
00050         bool         m_bSentQuit;                     // have we sent the quit message for this connection ?
00051         unsigned int m_uLoginNickIndex;               // the index of the identity nicknames used until now (see KviIrcConnection::loginToIrcServer())
00052         QString      m_szCommandToExecAfterConnect;   // yes.. this is a special command to execute after connection
00053         bool         m_bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect; // this is set to true if we have to simulate an unexpected disconnect even if we have sent a normal quit message
00054         kvi_time_t   m_tLastReceivedChannelWhoReply;  // the time that we have received our last channel who reply
00055         kvi_time_t   m_tLastSentChannelWhoRequest;    // the time that we have sent our last channel who request
00056         kvi_time_t   m_tLastReceivedWhoisReply;       // the time that we have received the last whois reply, reset to 0 when we receive an /END OF WHOIS
00057 public:
00058         bool sentStartTls(){ return m_bSentStartTls; };
00059         void setSentStartTls(){ m_bSentStartTls = true; };
00060 
00061         bool isInsideAuthenticate(){ return m_bInsideAuthenticate; };
00062         void setInsideAuthenticate(bool bInside){ m_bInsideAuthenticate = bInside; };
00063 
00064         bool isInsideCapLs(){ return m_bInsideCapLs; };
00065         void setInsideCapLs(bool bInside){ m_bInsideCapLs = bInside; };
00066 
00067         bool sentQuit(){ return m_bSentQuit; };
00068         void setSentQuit(){ m_bSentQuit = true; };
00069 
00070         kvi_time_t lastReceivedChannelWhoReply(){ return m_tLastReceivedChannelWhoReply; };
00071         void setLastReceivedChannelWhoReply(kvi_time_t tTime){ m_tLastReceivedChannelWhoReply = tTime; };
00072 
00073         kvi_time_t lastSentChannelWhoRequest(){ return m_tLastSentChannelWhoRequest; };
00074         void setLastSentChannelWhoRequest(kvi_time_t tTime){ m_tLastSentChannelWhoRequest = tTime; };
00075 
00076         kvi_time_t lastReceivedWhoisReply(){ return m_tLastReceivedWhoisReply; };
00077         void setLastReceivedWhoisReply(kvi_time_t tTime){ m_tLastReceivedWhoisReply = tTime; };
00078 
00079         bool simulateUnexpectedDisconnect(){ return m_bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect; };
00080         void setSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect(){ m_bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect = true; };
00081 
00082         unsigned int loginNickIndex(){ return m_uLoginNickIndex; };
00083         void setLoginNickIndex(unsigned int uNickIdx){ m_uLoginNickIndex = uNickIdx; };
00084 
00085         const QString & commandToExecAfterConnect(){ return m_szCommandToExecAfterConnect; };
00086         void setCommandToExecAfterConnect(const QString &szCmd){ m_szCommandToExecAfterConnect = szCmd; };
00087 };
00088 
00089 #endif //!_KVI_IRCCONNECTIONSTATEDATA_H_
